name: vintage-fades
description: Vintage Fades Barbershop - Full Stack Application

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd backend && npm run lint:fix && cd ../frontend && npm run lint:fix
